definitions.definition: To tackle (a player ) using a shoestring tackle ( “ one made near the ground , close to a player's shoes ” ) .
To catch (a ball ) using a shoestring catch ( “ one made near the ground, close to a player's shoes ” ) .

main_definition: ( transitive , American football ) To tackle (a player ) using a shoestring tackle ( “ one made near the ground , close to a player's shoes ” ) .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , baseball ) To catch (a ball ) using a shoestring catch ( “ one made near the ground, close to a player's shoes ” ) .
